room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie: Mutation" by Raleigh Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Jill and Ryan were amazing in our zombie room!! Thanks for an amazing time!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie: Mutation" by Raleigh Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Trapped in a Room with a Zombie was terrifyingly fun (just the way it should be)! Ryan was an incredible zombie and highly entertaining (those head tilts though)! Jill was an amazing mad scientist and analyzer of the team! Even Tara who welcomed us to Raleigh Room Escapes and led us to our room of doom was magnificent! My family and I had a blast! Definitely recommend!! When in doubt, just go!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie: Mutation" by Raleigh Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: We did the trapped in a room with a zombie and it was awesome! Tara started off the experience as a great (and funny!) host. Arin and Jess the zombie in the room created an intense atmosphere that took the puzzles to the next level. we cant wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie: Mutation" by Raleigh Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: Had a great time trying to escape the zombie! Did not make it out alive but it was a great first time in an escape room. Abigail and Sarah did a great job in their performances. Will definitely be back to try a different room.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie: Mutation" by Raleigh Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: The zombie room was by far the best that I've ever done! We had the privilege of being debriefed by Jill. She played her part perfectly and really added to the overall experience and thrill. Our zombie Rebecca was also an incredible actress. Can't wait to come back!
